name: GEAR LINK
description:
GEAR LINK is a game inspired by the 2016 Famicase entry for a game called Item Connect (http://famicase.com/16/softs/09.html), it immediately inspired me to make a game where you'd match items on a grid. Defeat enemies to progress through the game, complete challenges and collect gold to buy more GEAR, LINK this gear to get experience to improve your stats until you get 100% GEAR!

Get Ready To GEAR LINK!
